revised_title: Researches on the Gomphodontia: A Group of Anomodont Reptiles
tldr: The author examines the Gomphodontia, a group of Anomodont reptiles characterized by theriodont dentition, and describes their skull and skeletal structures. The study reveals similarities between Gomphodontia and Cynodontia, suggesting a close affinity between reptiles and mammals.
